intents.patterns: Can a pregnant women undergo covid-19 vaccination process ?
intents.responses: Yes, Yes, COVID-19 vaccination can be taken by women's who are pregnant, breastfeeding, or trying to get pregnant now, as well as those who are planning for pregnancy

intents.patterns: how does the covid -19 virus enters the human body?
intents.responses: The virus first enters the human body through airway that includes your mouth, nose, throat, and lungs.
Corona virus are a large family of viruses which cause illness and respiratory infections ranging from  common cold to severe acute respiratory diseases

intents.patterns: Can people with mild COVID-19 symptoms recover at home?
intents.responses: People with mild symptoms who are otherwise healthy should manage their symptoms at home. On average it takes 5–6 days from when someone is infected with the virus for symptoms to show, however it can take up to 14 days.
